-- | Generating images of resolution trees for Prolog queries.
--   
--   This is the library part (See
--   <a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/prolog-graph</a> for the command
--   line tool).
@package prolog-graph-lib
@version 0.1

module Language.Prolog.GraphViz
type Graph = Gr HtmlText HtmlText
newtype GraphGenT m a
GraphGenT :: (StateT Graph m a) -> GraphGenT m a
